name: AuditParamsRequest

fields.name: email
fields.signature: AuditParamsRequest Properties   The following are properties for AuditParamsRequest.
fields.description: Email of the client that initiated the request.

fields.name: ipAddress
fields.description: The customer’s IP address. Gateways often use this data in risk checks.

fields.name: macAddress
fields.description: Mac address of the customer’s device. Gateways often use this data in risk checks.

constructors.name: AuditParamsRequest
constructors.signature: AuditParamsRequest(String email, String macAddress, String ipAddress, String phone)    Parameters   email  Type: String   Email of the client that initiated the request.    macAddress  Type: String   Mac address of the customer’s device. Gateways often use this data in risk checks.    ipAddress  Type: String   The customer’s IP address. Gateways often use this data in risk checks.    phone  Type: String   Phone number of the client that initiated the request.

description: AuditParamsRequest is used for audit parameters in a transaction request. This is an abstract request class that is extended by the BaseRequest class.
